definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="dropChance">dropChance</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:dropChance</field><comment pinned="false" h="48" w="220">This sets a random drop chance to a local variable spawn seed.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><next><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><comment pinned="false" h="53" w="161">This drops your fully ripe crop fruit. (Wheat)</comment><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:HeartShapedHerbItem</field><comment pinned="false" h="34" w="151">Your custom fruit drop.</comment></block></value><value name="x"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="67" w="162">This will run if there is no item in the main hand that has fortune.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GTE</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Checks if the random variable has the proper chance to drop this tier of items.</comment><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:dropChance</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.9</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><comment pinned="false" h="51" w="191">This will repeat the procedure inside 3 times.</comment><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><comment pinned="false" h="32" w="173">This will drops your seeds.</comment><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:HeartShapedHerbSeeds</field><comment pinned="false" h="50" w="141">Set this to your seed item for your crops.</comment></block></value><value name="x"><block
